DialogDescription: Fill in the form below to create a new link.
NoTagsMessage: You don't have any tags created.
UrlErrorMessage: The URL and the shortUrl cannot be the same.
ShortUrlExistsError: The shortUrl already exists. Write another or generate a random shortUrl.
LimitReachedError: You have reached the limit of links you can create. Please delete some links to create new ones.
UnexpectedError: An unexpected error has occurred. Please try again later.
